name: Basketball Pong (Electrix4510YT)
description: This game is simple, their are 3 game modes. The first one is the normal mode which is just basic pong with a score. The second gamemode is free play which is basically normal mode just no red line that resets your score. The third gamemode is vs which is pong but your going against a cpu the goal is to make the ball hit the other persons red line. There is also a settings menu where you can turn off all the color changing things. (this game is still in work and will recieve updates)
